name: Let's rob the castle!
description:
This is an Runner Game, where you have to evitate obstacles. To get the most precius item in the world. The Thunder Wings.

Youll have to evitate all Enemies, and obstacles. Hope you enjoy. (Dont Forget To Vote For My Game, If You Liked It)

When you get to the final stage. You'll have to complete the MAZE. According to the legends. Many people have been trapped there and never got out.

So. Be careful.....

Controlls:

Move: WASD, or Arrows Keys.

Shoot: Right Shift, or Z.

When you get to the Maze you will move clicking....

Difficulties:

Difficulties: Easy, Medium, Hard, Impossible.
